title: malagayya jalajanAbha
sahitya:
malagayya jalajanAbha mANIkya mANikyadi


caraNam 1    AdishEShanu bandu hAsigeyAgiha vEda vinuta jagadAdi puruSa kOLo
    caraNam 2    siri bhU durgeyaru taruNiyaru mUvaru caraNavottalike kai kaTTi nintiharu
    caraNam 3    saruvagjnya muni vandya saruva svatantrane parama sundara purandara viTTalarAya
